comments.name: SomeRandomDudeOnTheInternet
comments.comment: I think you exaggerate the security challenges. A firewall/DDoS protection is nice but not necessary for personal websites. You really have to actively configure a service to listen on a public port. Also 99.99% of the maintenance is apt update && apt upgrade - certificates are updated automatically. But I am not denying your use case. You have a point.
